parameters.name: WantCubic
parameters.description: True for cubic curves, false if not

parameters.name: WantNRational
parameters.description: True for non-rational curves, false if not

title: ICurve.IGetBCurveParamsSize2
signature:
System.Int32 IGetBCurveParamsSize2( 
   System.Boolean
WantCubic
,
   System.Boolean
WantNRational
)

parameters.name: WantCubic
parameters.description: True for cubic curves, false if not

parameters.name: WantNRational
parameters.description: True for non-rational curves, false if not

returns: Size of the data set returned by ICurve::IGetBCurveParams .
remarks:
Use this method to control the type of information returned in the subsequent call to
ICurve::IGetBCurveParams
.
To control the accuracy of the curve data, use
IModeler::SetToleranceValue
.
